about.description: Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

name: dagstermill
raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  # source-of-truth
  version: 0.27.7
  python_max: '3.13'
  python_max_exclusive: '3.14'
  # package-specific
  # (pyspark <4 and great-expectations <1) require numpy <2, not built for python 3.13
  python_numpy1_max: '3.12'
  # derived
  patch_version: ${{ (version | split('.'))[2] }}
  dagster: dagster ==1.11.${{ patch_version }}
  # utility
  pip_install: -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

recipe:
  name: dagster-libs
  # the epoch is due to a historic issue with `conda-build` outputs
  # https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-feedstock/issues/301
  version: 1!${{ version }}

build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  # A
  - package:
      name: dagster-airbyte
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-airbyte/dagster_airbyte-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 3b4ccc8707d99e86ee00cbe33cb9ca47664927b1972547620cc1c186b8d12be0
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-airbyte = dagster_airbyte.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_airbyte
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-airbyte --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-airbyte
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Airbyte with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-aws
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-aws/dagster_aws-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: f3bd22fcd708bf75e3331646e467bafe9f474db40ed9b5c940bf395bb1c7e12e
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - boto3
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_aws
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-aws
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for AWS-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.
  # B
  # C
  - package:
      name: dagster-celery
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery/dagster_celery-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 10db68ef4fa3e2c334b62496dd280deddfe1acf2ce302409f7417cb238ebfe83
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-celery = dagster_celery.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - celery >=4.3.0
        - click >=5.0,<9
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-celery --help

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Celery as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-docker/dagster_celery_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 47a61c2c08875c662efe1e09085a283774d2d7ecf680822f0e4133b033ce3480
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - dagster-graphql
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_docker
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-k8s
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-k8s/dagster_celery_k8s-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 8cb78119fa9d9924f3b9e4e35d64d5e4e3effd7e6df25a88d48182247d62cb0a
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-k8s", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_k8s
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-k8s
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-k8s-executor

  - package:
      name: dagster-census
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-census/dagster_census-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 8c95409248df5508f8739238b740d459f8b96988d2d6045065814974e7568be5
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_census
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-census
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Census with Dagster.

  # D
  - package:
      name: dagster-dask
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dask/dagster_dask-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 46fc7849bb796041c26c9636d89834af0e5012b1493fccbd701cdfc3d9568d74
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - bokeh
        - dask >=1.2.2
        - distributed >=1.28.1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dask
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dask
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Dask as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-datadog
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-datadog/dagster_datadog-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: edcdf7ba3468b77b0b5d39fba8d39326f2b88acbaf573597a2d600fa31710200
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - datadog
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_datadog
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-datadog
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for datadog Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dbt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: bb526e56b1d2b14575d4931e708a5031420c46f7e7dc4abaa76bb61ace7f603b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud = dagster_dbt.cloud.cli:app
          - dagster-dbt = dagster_dbt.cli.app:app
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - jinja2
        - networkx
        - orjson
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-dateutil
        - requests
        - rich
        - sqlglot-rs
        - typer >=0.9.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dbt
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud --help
          - dagster-dbt --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dbt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for dbt

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake/dagster_deltalake-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1daf7dd5e692135ce3f63ab7465b06ba1bb9ed2b3c6cdaed53fd9bb5a97e0cf6
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - deltalake >=0.25.0,<1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Deltalake-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-pandas/dagster_deltalake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 4e04c9da572bfd4ee19a3fce22a53db69243832801aff7859d5974c6d2d5ab86
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in Delta tables

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-polars/dagster_deltalake_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 6fada69459bde4584a7869708dd304b3d83d81c60e135e7a710f9a92bfc86cbd
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - polars
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: update after https://github.com/conda-forge/polars-feedstock/issues/194
        # for now https://github.com/pola-rs/polars/blob/main/py-polars/pyproject.toml#L52C13-L52C29
        - pyarrow >=7.0.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in Delta tables.

  - package:
      name: dagster-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-docker/dagster_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: bbc42995ffab94c963bb4cd2b86b99eabad6d38e91e4782158cc1feeded017b3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - docker-image-py
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_docker
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb/dagster_duckdb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 6f7d83839b0ee1a33cc61c44beaa5a1ed2ae1d96875bffa4d0a48790ab7d0359
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-duckdb
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for DuckDB-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pandas/dagster_duckdb_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 11e091844375820bce3fc2bb9ef25e6e48677e603a830349d965c13a145d4d21
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-polars/dagster_duckdb_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 96c0832321b5f12d79d2dd1e508db5b5f0858e95a999f3c6501d2f3312832673
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyarrow >=4.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: get polars-with-X outputs
        - polars
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in DuckDB.
  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pyspark/dagster_duckdb_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 63192f9ac8115a1f22993ef4096e414de2c96ee22e7306febac1565f313de1d6
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - pyarrow
        - pyspark >=3,<4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            # TODO: replace with python_max when pyspark >=5
            - ${{ python_numpy1_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in DuckDB.

  # E
  # F
  - package:
      name: dagster-fivetran
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-fivetran/dagster_fivetran-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 56961590da636e772ef284b66e9d8b04eb2423d0ce13627f20de44210859accd
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-fivetran = dagster_fivetran.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_fivetran
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-fivetran --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-fivetran
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Fivetran with Dagster.

  # G
  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp/dagster_gcp-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 49fb7be6282087e6b4cacfca0999a5affa0285ebf37c52ebe4bff12856daaefb
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-pandas", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - db-dtypes
        - google-api-python-client
        - google-cloud-bigquery-core >=1.28.3
        - google-cloud-storage
        - oauth2client
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp
            - dagster_gcp.bigquery
            - dagster_gcp.dataproc
            - dagster_gcp.gcs
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for GCP-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp-pandas/dagster_gcp_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 2db051ebd7d129051651213bdcac435ad36dc6f89799625df60ebcd12fc5b383
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-gcp", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_gcp_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in GCP.

  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp-pyspark/dagster_gcp_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 81a384c388307876f0b70f477cb79a1ea4c4d4e6680be6ef0da04da17be17974
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-gcp", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyspark <4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_gcp_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            # TODO: replace with python_max when pyspark >=5
            - ${{ python_numpy1_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in GCP

          imports: dagster_mlflow
          pip_check: false

            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and Pandas with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pyspark/dagster_snowflake_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 947b67f7e018dfe42db24c195fda539208637fcb3f2b962d5d5f0285476238b0
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyspark <4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            # TODO: replace with python_max when pyspark >=5
            - ${{ python_numpy1_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and PySpark with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-ssh
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-ssh/dagster_ssh-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 9f81cd72f82136c445ff9d5e1bd3dee9c77cd295ad31fa065e0e106b1ac4d507
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - paramiko
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - sshtunnel
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_ssh
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-ssh
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for ssh Dagster framework components.

  # T
  - package:
      name: dagster-tableau
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-tableau/dagster_tableau-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 5e6af72f40e8f1b49a5422608a159974483a5de445128ac13b888fbd46b24250
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - pyjwt
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - tableauserverclient >=0.32
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_tableau
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-tableau
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Build assets representing Tableau workbooks and sheets.

  - package:
      name: dagster-twilio
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-twilio/dagster_twilio-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1da48ef31eef0aa1bc40c4f813bd398e356f2bde381082c89a23cb1f7c71359b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - twilio
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_twilio
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-twilio
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for twilio

  # U
  # V
  # W
  - package:
      name: dagster-wandb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-wandb/dagster_wandb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 672cad0481b820b267379840f0581240dd83cc458542caedb12cafa8f3508824
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - wandb >=0.15.11,<1.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_wandb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-wandb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for wandb Dagster components.

  # X
  # Y
  # Z

  # not hyphenated

  - package:
      name: dagstermill
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagstermill/dagstermill-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 30e4194901e73529e27464c222f6ac1d94994e1f1ee5491512016ff0ddda2686
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagstermill = dagstermill.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ipykernel >=4.9.0,!=5.4.0,!=5.4.1
        - ipython_genutils >=0.2.0
        - jupyter_client <8
        - nbconvert
        - packaging >=20.9
        - papermill >=1.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - scrapbook >=0.5
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagstermill
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagstermill --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagstermill
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for papermill

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io
  summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  documentation: https://docs.dagster.io
  description: >-
    Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

extra:
  feedstock-name: dagster-libs
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - conda-forge/dagster
